booster.description: Get this role by boosting the server.

customization.description: Choose this role if you publish photos, videos, drawings, music, or if you stream. This role will be automatically added if you have linked a Twitch or YouTube account.
Choose this role if you regularly play Minecraft or if you are part of this community. This role automatically adds the Gamer role.
Choose this role if you regularly play Roblox or if you are part of this community. This role automatically adds the Gamer role.

notification.description: Get notified when an event is planned.
Get notified when a new community highlight is available.
Get notified when a new game or software update is released.
Get notified when something related to your internet safety is discovered, mainly on Discord.

special.description: Get this role by linking your GitHub account to your Discord account.
Get this role by linking one of these accounts: Battle.net, Epic Games, League of Legends, PlayStation, Riot Games, Steam or Xbox, or by adding the Minecraftian or Robloxian role.
Get this role by joining Alan Walker's official server.
